- **Gene Name:** mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase kinase 14

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SAIL_1175_F12 (homo)]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Under FRc conditions, the length mutant hypocotyls is decreased compared to that of wild-type plants.  Under Rc conditions, the hypocotyl length and cotyledon area is similar to that of wild type.
